mapper.select: SELECT pf.FG_POST_FILE_ROOT, pf.FG_POST_FILE_ID, pf.FG_POST_FILE_NAME, pf.FG_POST_FILE_UUID,p.FG_POST_TITLE FROM FG_LIKE l JOIN FG_POST p ON l.FG_POST_ID = p.FG_POST_ID LEFT JOIN FG_POST_FILE pf ON p.FG_POST_ID = pf.FG_POST_ID WHERE l.FG_USER_CODE = #{fgUserCode} AND p.FG_POST_TYPE = 'free'
